properties.entry: INSERT INTO TB_CART ( CA_NO , BK_NO_CA , MEM_NO_CA , AMOUNT , TOTAL_PRICE , BK_TITLE , AUTHOR , ORIGIN_PRICE , PRICE , MAIN_IMG ) VALUES ( SEQ_CNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT CA_NO , BK_NO_CA , MEM_NO_CA , AMOUNT , TOTAL_PRICE , STATUS , BK_TITLE , AUTHOR , ORIGIN_PRICE , PRICE , MAIN_IMG FROM TB_CART JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (MEM_NO_CA = MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_NO_CA = ?
SELECT COU_NAME, COU_YN, DISCOUNT FROM TB_MEMBER M JOIN TB_MEM_COUPON ON (MEM_NO_COU = M.MEM_NO) JOIN TB_COUPON C ON (C.COU_NO = COU_NO_COU) WHERE COU_YN ='N' AND M.MEM_NO = ?
SELECT COU_NAME, COU_YN, DISCOUNT FROM TB_MEMBER M JOIN TB_MEM_COUPON ON (MEM_NO_COU = M.MEM_NO) JOIN TB_COUPON C ON (C.COU_NO = COU_NO_COU) WHERE COU_YN ='N' AND M.MEM_NO = ?
